person.persName: Samuel Lewis Auxier Jr. (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of Samuel Lewis Auxier Sr. and Sarah Brown Auxier. Married to Rebecca Phillips Auxier in 1814. Father of Nathaniel Auxier, John B. Auxier, Joseph Auxier, and Samuel Auxier. Married to Agnes Wells Auxier. Father of Martha Auxier, Thomas J. Auxier, Margaret Auxier, Elijah B. Auxier, William L. Auxier, James K. P. Auxier, and Angeline Auxier. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Employed Elijah B. Auxier, William L. Auxier, James K. P. Auxier, and Arch Collins as farmers in Johnson County in 1860.
